Comment: The response provides a comprehensive and insightful explanation of the theological significance behind the phrase "God has called us by name," emphasizing the personal relationship between individuals and God, as well as highlighting God's divine purpose and assurance. The explanation aligns well with the Christian worldview by demonstrating a clear understanding of the personal relationship and intention God has towards individuals. Great job in integrating biblical references and theological concepts to support the interpretation.
